content: TE-S SM Pointed chisels Ultra-robust TE-S pointed chisel bits for chipping/breaking up concrete and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultra-robust – inductive hardening makes these chisels especially resistant to mushrooming, wear and bending Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our chisels are made to power through your most demanding demolition work Certified quality – these chisels benefit from ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Breaking up or chipping concrete, brick or block Creating shallow recesses at any position within the slab For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Length: 14.2 in Product Class: Standard Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2429847 - Pointed chisel TE-S SM 36 - Package Size 1 pc - 2452290 - Pointed chisel TE-S SM 36 MP3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Pointed chisel TE-S SM 36
